name: Yoga Mentoring
description: Mindful Mentors is a youth development program designed to promote self-determination, self-regulation, self-awareness and self-worth in systems-involved youth, and to support these young people in pursuing careers as wellness practitioners. We use a youth-centered, collaborative, and developmental approach which emphasizes fostering relationships first as a foundation for later skill-building. We offer this program to Young Women’s Freedom Center (YWFC) clients in the San Francisco Bay Area. Th
